findings.title: Unused imports in FeeStorage.sol
findings.description: It’s recommended to remove unused imports from the code.

findings.title: Add send and sendToken function for FeeStorage to prevent bathed transfer DoS
findings.description: Adding send and sendToken functions to FeeStorage prevents potential DoS attacks from bathed transfers.

findings.title: Use call instead of transfer for Ethereum transfers
findings.description: It's recommended to use call instead of transfer for Ethereum transfers to prevent bathed transfer DoS.

findings.title: Inline documentation is not present for all of the smart contracts functions
findings.description: The audit report highlights that inline documentation is missing for some smart contract functions.
